summary: A feature-length compilation of episodes of the famous Japanese sci-fi TV series about a futuristic policeman who secretly transforms into a giant extraterrestrial savior.
cast: Akiji Kobayashi|Susumu Kurobe|Hiroko Sakurai|Akihiko Hirata|Bin Furuya|Sandayû Dokumamushi|Susumu Fujita|Masaya Nihei
title: Chôhen kaijû eiga: Urutoraman
